messages.title: DEMAND CLIMATE ACTION!
messages.content: The clearest and loudest way you can demand urgent action on the climate emergency is by voting Scottish Greens on December 12

messages.title: A GREEN VOTE IS URGENT
messages.content: Our climate is breaking down. This is an unprecedented global emergency and climate scientists are clear that we have just a decade left to radically cut emissions

messages.title: THE GREENS HAVE A PLAN
messages.content: Our Scottish Green New Deal would transform the economy, create hundreds of thousands of jobs in green industries, and slash emissions

messages.title: A GREEN VOTE SENDS A MESSAGE
messages.content: The other parties think that rhetoric and eye-catching targets are enough to get the green vote. They need to see that people demand action

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Implement the Scottish Green New Deal to transform the economy, create green jobs, and reduce emissions.

mentions.candidate: I need your help to deliver our message of more jobs in a just, green economy, our determination for a society where everyone can live in dignity, and our belief that Scotland's future is in Europe.

issues.environment: Our climate is breaking down. This is an unprecedented global emergency and climate scientists are clear that we have just a decade left to radically cut emissions. The Scottish Green New Deal aims to slash emissions.

images.caption: Cass MacGregor, your Green candidate for Glasgow North.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet focuses primarily on climate action, with specifics on the Scottish Green New Deal and the urgency of environmental issues.
